As part of Groupon, you will get to work on a product that touches hundreds of millions of people, create billions in revenue, and has positioned us as the foremost player in mobile commerce worldwide. You will work on meaningful and fulfilling projects with awesome team members to creatively help us solve real-time challenges. Exciting times ahead!
